IX.iii.1.A.5.b
.
Provisions of 38 CFR 3.31
Under
38 CFR 3.31
, payment of monetary benefits based on original, new, initial, supplemental, or increased awards of pension or Parents’ DIC may not be made for any period before the first day of the calendar month, following the month in which the award would otherwise have been effective.
For purposes of this provision, an
increased award
is an award that is increased because of
an added dependent
an increase in disability, or
a reduction in IVAP.
Notes
:
38 CFR 3.31
became effective October 1, 1982.
A reduction in IVAP can result from a change in income and/or deductible expenses.
